Detailed Description

IPMP agent.

Agent that participates in communication via IPMP messages. Eg. IPMP tool manager (terminal), IPMP tool.

Definition at line 35 of file IPMPAgent.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::IPMPAgent::ProcessMessage (  IPMPMessageFromTool *  in,
IPMPMessageFromTool **  out
)  [pure virtual]
 

Process input message and return response in out.

Warning:
This function must be thread safe.

Response may be 0, if none was created.

Parameters:
in input, input message.
out output, response message.
Returns:
Boolean indicating success or failure.

Implemented in DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::IPMPTool, DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::IPMPToolManager, and DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::OpenIPMPTool.

virtual const Bit32T& DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::IPMPAgent::IPMPIdentifier (   )  const [pure virtual]
 

IPMP agent identifier.

Identifier 0 represents IPMP terminal, others represent IPMP descriptor identifiers of IPMP tools' logical instances.

Returns:
Identifier.

Implemented in DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::IPMPToolManager, and DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::OpenIPMPTool.
